explains: adj. 气态的，气体的；无实质的

sentences.en: Freon exists both in liquid and gaseous states.
sentences.cn: 氟利昂既有液态也有气态。

sentences.en: All substances, whether they are gaseous, liquid or solid, are made of atoms.
sentences.cn: 一切物质，不论它们是气体、液体还是固体，都是由原子构成的。

sentences.en: There may be giant plankton on gaseous planets. They float in a thick atmosphere like small spaceships and live by "eating" lightning.
sentences.cn: 气态星球上可能存在巨型浮游生物。它们像小型飞船那样漂在厚厚的大气中，靠“吃”闪电获取能量为生。
